metadata.name: Gpresult Display Group Policy Information
metadata.comment: Detects cases in which a user uses the built-in Windows utility gpresult to display the Resultant Set of Policy (RSoP) information

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\gpresult.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/z')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/v'))))

output.summary: Detects cases in which a user uses the built-in Windows utility gpresult to display the Resultant Set of Policy (RSoP) information
